description: I. Letter dated 27/11/2009 from Lord Davies of Abersoch to Peter Luff MP regarding complaints about Unilever concerning its Mumbai factory. 1 p. II. Final Statement by the UK national contact point for the OECD guidelines for multinational enterprises: complaint from the International Union of Food, Agricultural, Hotel, Restaurant, Catering, Tobacco and Allied Workers' Associations against Unilever plc on India's Sewri factory. 4 p.
department: Dept for Business, Innovation and Skills
